title: About last Rust release

labels.name: T-core
labels.description: Relevant to the core team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: C-discussion
labels.description: Category: Discussion or questions that doesn't represent real issues.

body:
I know maybe this is not the place for this topic. But consider this as a problem that I introduce to your release and please accept it as an issue

I'm an Iranian person and of course fascinated by the Rust language! 
we have been under the heaviest US and Western sanctions for 43 years.  The voices of children suffering from diseases like eb are repeated in our ears, but we can't do anything for them because America and the West have banned the most necessary medicines for us (of course, I must inform you that today, our scientists reached this technology and we can now do this medicine and dressing for EB children! Like everything we have done so far. [read more](https://www.irna.ir/amp/84786840/) ). 
For all this time, you have said nothing about our sufferings, and of course we have no expectations. because you are influenced by your media. We were alone from the beginning, but we are strong and under all the sanctions, we also achieved our own successes and we do not need the sympathy of others. so you can see Iran's scientific, cultural and social rankings in the world in 43 years ago under heaviest sanctions [here](https://fa.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D8%B1%D8%AA%D8%A8%D9%87%E2%80%8C%D8%A8%D9%86%D8%AF%DB%8C%E2%80%8C%D9%87%D8%A7%DB%8C_%D8%A8%DB%8C%D9%86%E2%80%8C%D8%A7%D9%84%D9%85%D9%84%D9%84%DB%8C_%D8%A7%DB%8C%D8%B1%D8%A7%D9%86) and many other references u can search by your self without Impact of media. of course, this is not my issue and I just wanted to say that we can handle the sanctions ourselves.
but my issue is it: now that the media has caught your eye and won't let you see the reality and hear our voice, so please either continue your silence or If you are really worried about us Iranians, as you condemned Mahsa's death in this release, in your next release, condemn the cruel sanctions imposed by America and the West on Iranians. otherwise, I just as a human, despite all the attractive and excellent features of the Rust language and despite all my love for it, I can no longer continue to use it.

With all respects and thanks.
